name: uneventfully
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is uneventful (= where nothing interesting happens): The weekend passed rather uneventfully. The flight took off uneventfully at 8.00 a.m. See
uneventful
More examplesFewer examplesHe taped the interview, which went smoothly if uneventfully. The patient has been cared for uneventfully for several months.The surgery was carried out smoothly and uneventfully.
